messages.subject: Izumi no Kami kanesada
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings all, I am looking into a sword signed Izumi no Kami Kanesada saku I believe to be from the late Shinshinto era. I can find reference to the 11th gen
messages.messageBody:
Greetings all, I am looking into a sword signed Izumi no Kami Kanesada saku I believe to be from the late Shinshinto era. I can find reference to the 11th gen Kanesada and the (last) 13th gen Kanesada but nothing on the 12th Gen. does anyone have any info or can point me to a resource please.
regards

Rich T

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Izumi no Kami kanesada
messages.msgSnippet: I haven t checked, but the only source I can think of would be Kataoka s Nihonto Zuikan. Gordon ... From: Richard Turner  To:
messages.messageBody:
I haven't checked, but the only source I can think of would be Kataoka's
Nihonto Zuikan.

Gordon
----------
From: "Richard Turner" <ikkanshi@...>
To: <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>
Subject: [nihontostudy] Izumi no Kami kanesada
Date: Tue, 29 Apr 2003 15:24:36 +0800


Greetings all, I am looking into a sword signed Izumi no Kami Kanesada saku
I believe to be from the late Shinshinto era. I can find reference to the
11th gen Kanesada and the (last) 13th gen Kanesada but nothing on the 12th
Gen. does anyone have any info or can point me to a resource please.
regards

Rich T
